title: Books on typography
content:
Hi!  
this is my first post (and i hope you will excuse me if i didn’t see a topic about what i’m going to ask you) and i’d like to have some informations.  
I’m going to graduate in Graphic Design at the Politecnico of Milano ( [www.design.polimi.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.design.polimi.it/ "www.design.polimi.it")) and i’d like to work on the “report” (i hope this is the right word! :) ) between typography and tridimensionality.  
i’m searching for books about this subject and i found these two on amazon:

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1568980892/sr=8-1/qid=1139953826/ref=pd...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/1568980892/sr=8-1/qid=1139953826/ref=pd_bbs_1/002-0740798-2052027?%5Fencoding=UTF8 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1568980892/sr=8-1/qid=1139953826/ref=pd\_bbs\_1/002-0740798-2052027?%5Fencoding=UTF8")

and

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/3907078896/ref=sib\_rdr\_dp/002-0740798-2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/3907078896/ref=sib_rdr_dp/002-0740798-2052027?%5Fencoding=UTF8&me=ATVPDKIKX0DER&no=283155&st=books&n=283155 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/3907078896/ref=sib\_rdr\_dp/002-0740798-2052027?%5Fencoding=UTF8&me=ATVPDKIKX0DER&no=283155&st=books&n=283155")

can you suggest something more?  
thanks a lot!  
t.

Buonasera!  
(i’ll try to write in english to let also the other users understand ;) )  
It’s funny to found in an international website a user who studied in the same university i’m studying  
for the first part of our degree work we (it was a team work) studied the book “flatland” by Edwin Abbott and we illustrated it and now we have to work on a specific argument and so i’d like to study what i wrote in my first post.  
My prof are Mario Piazza (president of aiap - [www.aiap.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.aiap.it/ "www.aiap.it") ), Giacomo Spazio ( [http://www.spazio.org/giacomo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.spazio.org/giacomo/ "http://www.spazio.org/giacomo/") ) and Francesco Cavalli (from [www.leftloft.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014050426/http:/www.leftloft.it/ "www.leftloft.it")).  
Alessandro: do you work in my faculty?may i contact you in private for more infos?thanks a lot!
Tommaso, non le confermo che lavoro nella sua facoltà, lavoro in Turchia, ma mi può contattare in privato quando crede.
